title: [Large-scale] Promoting STEM Education through Online Learning Communities: Math-Centered Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: High School-Level Mathematics Foundations and Workplace Data Analysis Experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening mathematical application competencies for solving practical problems in smartphone-based collaborative learning environments

learning_goals: Learners complete math problem-solving projects with over 80% participation by applying CSCL techniques in online learning communities using smartphones
Learners develop three or more job-related math models through PLC activities incorporating peer feedback and expert mentoring
Learners systematically document and share team project deliverables using online collaboration tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
